attributes.action: Give Local Councils the right to take posession of property that is left empty longer than a Year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is it right that a property be left empty when there are so many homeless people who could benefit from them.

Giving councils permission to take posession of a property that has been left empty for longer than a year, would allow them to house more people at a rate that they could afford.
